name: FIND (shach, seandermer)
description:
A Challenging Local Multiplayer Experience for Four

Overcome the colorful maze,  cooperate to find each other and eventually a way out

Instructions
Open executable & play with either four xBox controllers using the YXAB buttons

Or

Play with a keyboard
Keyboard Key Bindings:

Player 1 - W,  A,  S,  D

Player 2 - Y,  G,  H,  J

Player 3 - P,  L,  ; ,  '

Player 4 - Up, Down, Left, Right (Arrow Keys)

Game Design:  Michael Barzellai, Shachar Kantor. Programming: Sean Dermer. Guidance: Barak Shelef, Roy Rachamim. Bezalel Academy of Arts and Design, 2019.
